alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 10:11AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Seneca, southwestern Sandusky, Wood and northern Hancock Counties through 1100 AM EDT... At 1011 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arcadia, or 7 miles west of Fostoria, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Findlay, Bowling Green, Fostoria, Bluffton, North Baltimore, Gibsonburg, McComb, Arcadia, Rawson, Van Buren, Pemberville, Luckey, Bradner, Wayne, Bloomdale, Bettsville, Risingsun, Cygnet, Portage and Jerry City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
